text: Need Joshua Hall for Big W campaign. Budget around $1,873, looking for 2 x Social media takeover, 1 x Press release quote, 1 x Facebook post, 2 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x TikTok video. 8 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
